entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Courtenay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:44 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -4.0°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 41 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
